name: Defense of the Kings
summary:
Welcome to Defense of the Kings, the ultimate castle defense game where you get to lead your army to victory and defend your kingdom against fierce warriors and monsters.

In Defense of the Kings, you can choose from five different races of warriors: Ancient, Human, Orc, Forest, and Undead. Each race has unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, giving you a diverse set of options to build your army and conquer your enemies.
